data.text:
I very rarely give a bad review because I try to appreciate every small gesture, but this hotel gave me absolutely nothing to appreciate. Choking in to this hotel felt like checking into a prison! It was the most dry and rude experience I have ever had in any hotel around the world! I only received orders, the front desk employees did not speak any English, and later on when I asked why does nobody here speak a few words in English comparing to Cappadocia where everyone spoke English, the answer I received was :”Izmir is not a touristic city”!!! what a BS! Nobody working in the Hospitality Industry should ever give an answer like that.
The hotel itself is VERY OLD, completely deteriorated, and it looks nothing like the pictures you see online. The rooms are rusty and falling apart, and the carpet is very dirty and smelly. I requested a smoke free room, and I was given a room in the smoke free floor, however the whole floor reeked with the smell of cigarettes and cigar! I struggles with my asthma attacks during the whole stay in that hotel.
The breakfast was MISERABLE! The restaurant looked worst than a hospital cafeteria! There was only one employee preparing the food and managing the restaurant. Breakfast consisted of a couple fried pastries, 2 tomatoes 3 pieces of cheese, one boiled egg, some pieces of cucumber and a few salad leaves.
When I checked out, I found out that I was charged in EURO which was the highest currency! This hotel is a complete fraud. I paid the cost of a 4 star hotel and I felt completely ripped off. I am writing this review because I don’t want anyone else to go through this experience, vacation days are very valuable!
data.title: Absolutely terrible!

data.text: Good hotel and clean, nice service with small economic rooms , it is in the center of all the needed shops, very calm area and near the restaurants chain of the pier, near taxi station, nice choice to stay there
data.title: Good hotel

data.text: I have stayed here three times now. It is a bit old fashioned but I found it very comfortable, it is advisable to pay a little more and have a sea facing room. The location is probably one of the best in Izmir, overlooking the sea and central.
data.title: Excellent location comfortable inexpensive sea front hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Jsbuckley,

Thank you for choosing Kordon Otel Alsancak for your stay, and sharing your experiences with us. We are glad to hear that you were satisfied of our services, and that you have positive impressions about our staff. Our guests always come first, and it is a pleasure to see that we have succeed to make our guests feel this importance we give. We hope to see and welcome you again in our hotel.
owner_response.author: KordonOtel

data.text: Toilet door was broken and the dinner selection was poor because there were none. Also the sausages were not cooked. Overall it was fine. I  did not enjoy but the location of the hotel is great and I only slept here so I don’t wanna complain too much.The room was clean but I didnt like the carpets they looked very dirty. Door to the room was broken too so it was not safe. The boyoz in breakfast was great but Boyoz is always great ondan dolayı üstünüze alınmayın karşim.teşekkürler,saygılar
data.title: Yani fine

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
We really appreciate you being our guest and for taking time to your review. I want to inform you that we had a department heads meeting and I shared your comments with all our committee. You can be sure that your comments are taking seriously and will be fed back to the staff for their attention by our department heads. It is our goal to fully exceed your expectations the next time your travels bring you back this way. Your feedback in invaluable and we thank you very much . I hope that we'll have the pleasure of welcoming you again to our hotel. Best Regards, Kordon Otel Alsancak
owner_response.author: KordonOtel

data.text:
Two improvement areas to be better;
• Breakfast service and content can be absolutely better. They should think about outsourcing if it is difficult to manage..
• Front desk staff can be more qualified esp. for night shift. 
It is a good hotel regardless of two points.
data.title: Good location
